T

tempStringLength - Variable in class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
tempStringLength is used to hold the original string length during a resize process, and also is used to determine if a resize is needed.
Tester - Class in <Unnamed>
This class imports the source files in the package edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff to utilize those public methods.
Tester() - Constructor for class Tester
 
TextLine - Class in edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff
TextLine class holds all the methods related to the text line, _TextLine.
TextLine() - Constructor for class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
TextLine constructor initializes the variables stringLength to 0, capacitySize to DEFAULT_SIZE (80), and creates a new character array of DEFAULT_SIZE, _TextLine.
TextLine(String) - Constructor for class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
TextLine(String line) constructor initalizes each character in the string line to a new character array _TextLine It is public so it can be accessed in other classes or packages
TextLineCopy() - Method in class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
TextLineCopy() copies _TextLine to _TempTextLine during a resizing process It is protected so it can be accessed in other classes.
TextLineCopyBack() - Method in class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
TextLineCopyBack() copies _TempTextLine to a new _TextLine and resizes if needed.
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException - Exception in edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException class extends from IndexOutOfBoundsException.
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException() - Constructor for exception edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException() calls the constructor from IndexOutOfBoundsException and exits.
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException(String) - Constructor for exception edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException(String errMsg) calls the constructor from IndexOutOfBoundsException, displays an error message, and exits.
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException(int) - Constructor for exception edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException(int index) calls the constructor from IndexOutOfBoundsException, prints which index is out of bounds, and exits.
toString() - Method in class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
toString() is an overridden method that converts the character array _TextLine to a string and returns that string.
